description:
Hello!
I`m the new teacher, Yabe Satoshi!
Today we`re playing "Fruit Basket Turnover" to celebrate my becoming the teacher for class 6-3.
I`ve prepared myself for all the situations I expected to encounter in an elementary school, 
but this particular class is home to three problem children.
The Marui sisters,
Mitsuba-chan, Futaba-chan and Hitoha-chan.
I wanted our Fruit Basket Turnover game to be fun, but it ended up being horrible beyond imagination.
How the heck am I supposed to survive this...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Marui-ke! Ii Ko Warui Ko Osoroshii Ko!!
The Marui Family! The Good, the Bad, and the Fearsome!
